document.full_text: after co-producing more than 100 billboard hot 100 hits for fox's "glee," the show's executive music producer, adam anders, is looking to capture some of that lightning in a bottle for recording artists on his own label.
document.title: "glee" producer adam anders launches record label
lines_and_colors: after co-producing more than 100 billboard hot 100 hits for fox's "glee," the show's executive music producer, adam anders, is looking to capture some of that lightning in a bottle for recording artists on his own label.
